metadata.title: CVE-2019-6233 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 12.1.3, tvOS 12.1.2, Safari 12.0.3, iTunes 12.9.3 forWindows, iCloud for Windows 7.10. Processing maliciously crafted webcontent may lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.22.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.22.4-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.22.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.22.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.22.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.22.4-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.22.4-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.4-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
